name: Elysian (Kieryu, amaryan96, Laura del Pino Díaz, Jen Prox)
name_original: Elysian (Kieryu, amaryan96, Laura del Pino Díaz, Jen Prox)
description:
Synopsis

The protagonist wakes up and is faced with a strange person, who links him to a another and entrusts them with a mission. They both have to embark on a long and hard journey, where they will meet other travellers and different inhabitants who will share a stretch of the road, a campfire with a story or need help. 

The decisions the player makes during these events will determine the success of their journey.

Features
  • Atmospheric art and fantasy scenaries
  • +7.000 Words, in English AND Spanish!
  • 4 Endings! (Okay... four slightly different endings)
  • Travel at your own pace, recollect food and trade with merchants. (But keep an eye to the remaining days!)
  • Get to know your partner, Dorian, how do you develop your relationship is crucial to the ending of this story
Credits
  • Luis Ángel Pérez - Game Director
  • Laura del Pino - Lead Developer
  • Jennibel López - Lead Artist
  • Tony Peña - Sound Designer
  • Ágora Martín - English Translation
